Label: Venue note
Description: Free text of a short note related to the venue. Optional, and repeatable to provide parallel notes in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <VenueNote>, but must be included in each instance if <VenueNote> is repeated.
Format: Variable length text, suggested maximum length 1000 characters. XHTML is enabled in this element – see Using XHTML, HTML, XML, JSON within ONIX text fields
Example: <x553 language="eng">Visitors requiring wheelchair access: please contact the venue in advance.</x553>
